price: Dhugumatti, isaannan Gooftaa kee bira jiran Isa gabbaruu irraa hin boonanu; Isa qulqulleessu; Isaaf sujuuda godhu. {1}
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لَا يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ عَنۡ عِبَادَتِهِۦ وَيُسَبِّحُونَهُۥ وَلَهُۥ يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩
footnotes: {1} bakka tanatti namni qur'aana qarau sujuuda tokko godha. sujuuda tilaawaa (qaraatii qur'aanaa) jedhama. sunnaa jaalatamaadha. inni qur'aana keessa bakka 15 jira.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ʿinda rabbika lā yastakbirūna ʿan ʿibādatihi wayusabbiḥūnahu walahu yasjudūna
